english: Fall seven times, stand up eight
meaning: Perseverance through failure leads to success

english: The mouth is the source of disaster
meaning: Be careful what you say, words can cause trouble
Accomplishing two things with one action

japanese: 郷に入っては郷に従え
romaji: Gou ni itte wa gou ni shitagae
english: When in a village, follow the village customs
meaning: When in Rome, do as the Romans do
Time is valuable and should not be wasted

english: Hearing a hundred times is not as good as seeing once

japanese: 案ずるより産むが易し
english: Giving birth is easier than worrying
meaning: Things are often easier done than worried about
